recommended_degree: Manajemen, Akuntansi, Administrasi Bisnis, Teknik Industri, Administrasi Logistik (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Support handle end to end purchasing activity from research potential vendor, evaluate their offers, negotiate contract terms, pricing to monitoring their arrival at our warehouse.
2. Support fulfill all purchasing request and ensure all the purchased goods arrive safely & on time in our warehouse.
3. Ensure the quality of purchased goods meet our company's standard.
4. Maintain relationship with our vendors and review their performances.
5. Prepare & maintain all type of purchasing report.
6. Do some other administrative related to purchasing.
